titles: An argument shewing, that a standing army, with consent of Parliament, is not inconsistent with a free government, &c.
author: Defoe, Daniel, 1661?-1731.
notes: Attributed to Daniel Defoe. Cf. BM.
A reply to: An argument shewing that a standing army is inconsistent with a free government by John Trenchard and Walter Moyle.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Trenchard, John, 1662-1723. --  Argument shewing that a standing army is inconsistent with a free government.
